store.view

Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • store.view.LoginManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="loginManager")
 @SessionScoped
public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the bean mostly used for the managing of the login interface. This bean however, is also used by other beans too, in order for example to get information about the user that is currently logged in.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
